entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rfc2898DeriveBytes severe memory spike on Android #102406
  • [Analyzer] Incorrect lambda type passed to ConcurrentDictionary.GetOrAdd #102398
  • Random segmentation fault in managed code on 32-bit ARM linux with dotnet 8.0 #102396
  • Generated executable can't load main assembly #102393
  • How can I use IReadOnlySet in netstandard2.0? #102389
  • [API Proposal]: Add TaskAwaiter.OnCompleted() overload to support static delegates. #102387
  • WasmTestOnChrome-MT-System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.WorkItemExecution timeout #102385
  • CancelPendingFlushDuringBackpressureThrows test fails on arm32 #102378
  • [browser][hybridglobalization][aot] `Assert.StartsWith` cannot find a match #102373
  • Assert failure: executionAborted in `GcInfoDecoder::EnumerateLiveSlots` #102370
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.InvalidSelfSignedSignature #102360
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.ChainErrorsAtMultipleLayers #102359
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.DynamicChainTests.BasicConstraints_ExceedMaximumPathLength #102358

Closed

  • [mono] Implement UnmanagedCallersOnly support for Swift calling convention #100010
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 30 Regressions on 1/3/2024 6:04:00 PM #96694
  • Feature Request: Add a dotnet root path property to the runtimeconfig.json file. #102329
  • Assembly.LoadFrom overload unconditionally throws NotSupportedException #96410
  • Test failure: JIT/PGO/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst.cmd #98913
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: _Runtime_86207::Runtime_86027.TestRotateLeft1() #101361
    9.0.0
  • unable to run simple exe generated from ilasm on linux #102380
  • ObjectStackAllocation: Assert failure "Precode->GetType() == PRECODE_FIXUP" #102294
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] System.Text.Json.Tests running out of memory #98578
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: TypeDescriptor-related trimming support #101202
    9.0.0
  • win-arm64 tests failing with `Assert failure: (uImageBase == uImageBaseFromOS) && (memcmp(pFunctionEntry, pFunctionEntryFromOS, sizeof(RUNTIME_FUNCTION)) == 0)` #102337
  • ARM64: suboptimal codegen for Vector64.Create(1) #101661
    Future
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.BufferBlock - Memory leak on OutputAvailableAsync #99564
  • LockStatementWithLockVsMonitor failing in native AOT outerloop #102321
  • Legacy code crashes in net 8.0 runtime #102338

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ability to dump ILLink traces for all tests #102409
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • ILLink: Add test for event warning origin issue #102405
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [cdac] Implement GetThreadStoreData in cDAC #102404
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #102397
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix the definition of `RhGetCurrentThunkContext` #102395
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use BinaryPrimitives for `ObjectDataBuilder` primitive emit logic #102394
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete DebugSymbols property #102392
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix typo in ComInterfaceInfo.OptionsAreValid #102384
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Experimental changes to address sbrk failures on MT CI lanes #102383
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [DRAFT] Remove dependency to BinaryFormatter from System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix cancellation unregistration in DataflowBlock.OutputAvailableAsync #102376
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 8.0.x
  • [mono] Don't use direct wrapper when invoking cctors, so all cctors can share one wrapper #102375
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • DATAS tuning changes #102368
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix description discovery for `wasm-experimental` workload #102367
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket failures on wasm test runs #102366
    arch-wasm
  • test firefox shm #102365
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Cleanup CoreLib CompatibilitySuppressions #102363
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Use the PGO runtimes installed in the correct/default location #102390
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Mono] added simple reverse pinvoke support to interpreter #102185
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • ILLink: Add PropertyNode for dependency analysis #102026
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #102207
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Update branding to 8.0.7 #102356
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Mark LoadFrom overload that always throws as obsolete #102292
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Update branding to 6.0.32 #102355
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Disable sse2 test on full aot lane #102336
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • ILLink: Remove ScopeStack from MarkStep #102282
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update branding to 7.0.20 #102354
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete PAL definitions of MS-specific __int... types #102304
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix "pPrecode->GetType() == PRECODE_FIXUP" assert #102372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Backport #92375 #102172
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Disable fullAOT-llvm job on x64 due to OOM errors #102330
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.LastIndexOfAny #102331
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • TypeDescriptor-related trimming supportType descriptor #102094
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix assert in Thread::VirtualUnwindCallFrame on ARM64 #102350
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix build of coreclr test JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_1102138 #102371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Separate hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #101543
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Don't use write barriers for byref-like struct copies #102316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Vector64.Create for constants #101662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use alternative mechanisms to allow us to use the default new/delete implementations #101947
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Fix cancellation unregistration in DataflowBlock.OutputAvailableAsync #99632
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 9.0.0
  • Fix some assertions that fail when using `Lock` instances with `Monitor` #102327
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Eliminate dead branches around typeof comparisons #102248
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • `CodeVersionManager` updates #102298
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • SVE: Added `Load2xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load3xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load4xVectorAndUnzip` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • ILLink: Add EdgeVisitor and ITracingNode to enable logging dependency graph edges to illink dependency loggers #101949
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #102346
    area-codeflow
  • ilasm support for methods with multiple documents #102199
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enable RPO-based block layout by default #102343
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add `SetEntryAssembly()` API to `System.Reflection` #102271
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add saturating decrement/increment by element count #102315
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add some basic guidelines around using C++ standard headers now that our build allows us to #101088
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 2 #102297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates (Backport #99433) #102242
    area-Infrastructure
  • [LoongArch64] Add ProbeLoongArch64Quirks() for R2RDump tool. #102146
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #102345
    area-codeflow
  • Add three-stage enqueuer/dispatcher scheme to SocketAsyncEngine, ThreadPoolWorkQueue and ThreadPoolTypedWorkItemQueue #100506
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Add .NET Libraries fuzzing targets and automation #101993
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Connection Activities in SocketsHttpHandler #101814
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Enumerable.Index/Select((T, int)) iterator classes #102314
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Improve code generating resolve stub assembly #102318
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #102254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add reasoning about loop trip counts and optimize counted loops into downwards counted loops #102261
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift frozen struct lowering in mini-JIT/AOT/interpreter #102143
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded loader #99998
    blocked, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Check for newlines in email address. #102311
    area-System.Net
  • Adjust repro file message for merged test #102141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expand host_runtime_contract to include the entry assembly and probing paths #100503
    area-Host
  • Fix DEREF_AFTER_NULL in /src/coreclr/jit/fgopt.cpp #102342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Testing] Move tizen_armel to global-build.yml #102334
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Support dotnet.js #2434
  • Performance benchmarking framework for Swift projection tooling #2586

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Migrate runtime imports (FCalls) and exports to the managed calling convetion #2587

Updated

  • Add basic support for frozen structs projections #2560
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CVE-2023-29331 - dotnet-watch depends on out of date System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs #40974
  • Project restore fails for .NET MAUI Hybrid App on .NET 8 - Workload dependency issue #40978
  • 🐞 NullReferenceException in Maui UnitTests #40955

Closed

  • .NET Core SDK 2.2.2nn and 2.1.6nn do not work with Visual Studio 2017 #3124
    Discussion
  • .NET SDK Debian 11, Alpine 3.14 and Ubuntu 20.04 has vulnerabilities in ACR Qualys Scan #22056
  • Unaddressed CVEs detected in SDK Images #33952
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40985

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Any Time

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert fires in `EnsureMetadataVirtual` #73563
  • Consider adjusting wording for `ErrorCode.ERR_NoConvToIDisp` #73559
  • Follow up on used assemblies validation failure for `AnonymousTypeMember_02` unit-test #73558
  • Consider testing scenario similar to the one in `UnscopedRef_02` without params #73557
  • A misleading warning is reported for an inline array type with ref like type parameter as an element type #73556
  • Consider testing scenario similar to one in `MissingScopedInOverride_01`, but with implicitly scoped parameter #73555
  • Consider testing ERR_ScopedMismatchInParameterOfPartial and ERR_ScopedMismatchInParameterOfTarget when ref like type parameters are involved #73554
  • Enable `RefFieldTypeAllowsRefLike` test once we get support for 'byreflike' in IL #73553
  • New syntax related APIs to support "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #73552
  • A test gap in `VisitDeclarationPattern` method #73551
  • A test gap in `CheckInvocationArgMixing` method #73550
  • A test gap in `GetValEscape` method #73549
  • Remove `MetadataHelpers.GenericParameterAttributesAllowByRefLike` in favor of `GenericParameterAttributes.AllowByRefLike` #73548
  • Expose Hot Reload functionality for third-party tools #73543
  • Auto formatting C# code with list assignments does not indent correctly #73541
  • Interface implementation option not available for classes #73540

Closed

  • Code that compiled using SDK 8.0.250 fails to compile when using SDK 8.0.300 with error CS0121 #73506

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge branch 'features/RefStructInterfaces' into 'main' #73567
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Don't implicitly load assemblies via MEF in Roslyn language server #73566
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report EnC warning when entry point is changed #73565
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Work around crash in Document Outline #73564
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Improve intense CPU hotspot in FAR (part 2)" #73560
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expose Hot Reload feature for third party applications #73544
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Expose Solution and Project APIs for third-party tools #73542
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73538
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Disable nullable comparison optimization for decimals #73536
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Batch FAR window update messages to lower refresh overhead. #73534
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Partial properties: misc compiler layer work #73527
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties

Merged

  • Check language version for more scenarios #73546
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Deal with some PROTOTYPE comments #73561
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Pack values for enum members #73562
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • More classification perf fixes. #73535
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add a pinned pkcs entry #73515
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary allocations while finding token matches in a file #73547
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix up a couple places that create a buffer or sourcetext from strings #73537
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Install SDK in devcontainer based on global.json #73526
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Lower the amount of time FAR spends in classification by 4% #73533
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix assert in ref safety analysis around BoundConditionalReceiver node. #73491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Target net9.0 in tests and provide real implementation for RuntimeSupportsByRefLikeGenerics helper #73525
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Move AsyncBatchingWorkQueue usage in telemetry to TelemetryLogging level #73485
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update "ref in async" feature status #73489
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix CPM in official builds (2) #73532
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Convert from Newtonsoft to STJ in cohosting #73528
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Verify that ref-in-async errors are not downgraded to warnings in unsafe context #73490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, Next
  • Update razor serialization #73531
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update partial properties feature branch from main #73522
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Improve performance of FAR #73523
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Allow razor to override RazorDesignTimeTargets to ones shipped with tooling instead of the sdk #73524
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2454194 #73415
    auto-merge
  • Adjust receiver in instance invocations #73501
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Avoid unnecessary allocations while finding token matches in a file #73500
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove dependency on all Roslyn assemblies from build host #73497
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mvc #55776
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55775
  • IssuerAddress not being set in OpenidConnectHandler.HandleChallengeAsyncInternal #55774
  • Databinding in Blazor: Is it possible to use Complex type as a property type on a Component for databinding? #55773
  • UserManager.AddToRolesAsync() and RemoveFromRolesAsync() fail on any conflict #55772
  • blazor+winforms start failed with FileNotFoundException #55771
  • Blazor 8 - delegating handler cannot use local/session storage #55770
  • Allow specifying exact authentication schemes in AuthenticationMiddleware. #55766
  • Call `onClosed` or provide an `onStopped` method to be called when the connection is stopped in certain cases #55765
  • With Blazor .NET 8, using JSHost.ImportAsync in component in a Razor Class Library (RCL) to load a collocated JavaScript module doesn't appear to work #55764
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #55761

Closed

  • FileStreamResultExecutor does not support DisposeAsync #55441
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #55742
  • Perf improvement: json_spring #55754
  • Perf regression: mapaction #55762
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct #55755
  • Blazor.webassembly.js - Unhandled exception rendering component: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'removeChild') #55518

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `fa6de7f` to `33af80a` #55767
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to 8.0.7 #55759
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.32 #55758
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Use DisposeAsync in FileStreamResultExecutor #55524
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix minor issues in `[Typed]Results` docs #55747
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview5
  • Add .NET 9 nightly NuGet feed and remove .NET 7 #55680
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Make DefaultProblemDetailsFactory public #55666
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Use new PipeWriter Json overloads #55740
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-17
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • fix versioning of symstore ported assets #4670

Updated

  • Implement CLRMA interfaces on top of DAC APIs #4667

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border's corner radius malform during expand animation #22499
  • Error when running the project as windows machine #22498
  • [Entry] [Android] Cursor makes undesired jumps with Masked Behavior #22497
  • Spans with FontAttributes do not render on Android (When Span.Text uses data binding) #22491
  • (1)Error running default MAUI/NET8 win10 solution. (2)Another user has already installed an unpackaged version of this app (3) Could not establish trust relationship for the SSL/TLS secure channel #22489
  • Adding value dynamically using parameters to the InputTextarea in the OnBindingContextChanged after some delay, the value not updated properly. #22486
  • XAML error is shown when the content of a DataTemplate is not a View #22485
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Run .NET Multi-platform App UI development problem run under Windows 10 #22482
  • Arabic Text Tap Gestures don't work on Label Spans in iOS #22480
    Backlog
  • Images do not layout correctly in Mac and iOS #22479
  • On Android, if there's more then one entry in ViewCell, the second entry calls the Unfocused event on every keystroke #22474
    Backlog

Closed

  • Frame and RadioButton conflict #20339
    Backlog
  • Application freezes when phone font size (or anything affecting UI) changes while app is running. #18284
    Backlog
  • [UITEST] CollectionView Enable Legacy Tests #19050
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Maui Android intent filter ActionView for MimeTypes not working #22261
    Backlog
  • ViewCells are not GC'ed on iOS, causing cascading memory leak #20195
    .NET 8 SR6
  • TabbedPage inside Grid works in debug mode, but throws exception in release mode (Copy of #16326) #22457
  • [MAUI]Adding 7 to D10 and continue clicking a few more times, then click ‘-’, the page will get stuck. #22478
  • [Windows] Cannot run `StyleTests.StyleClassAreCorrecltyMerged` unit test in Visual Studio #22355
  • the project needs to be deployed before we can debug. #22477
  • Has anyone done a human body keypoint test? #22464
  • It is not possible to unfocus an Entry and HideSoftInputOnTapped closes soft keyboard but does not remove focus from Entry #21053
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Make "IsConnected" public #22500
    community ✨
  • Add switch to BlazorWebView to configure 'fire and forget' for Android Disposal #22496
    area-blazor
  • Some fixes I needed #22494
  • App Crash during Scroll Animation while navigating away from Page - fix #22492
    area-animation, community ✨
  • [X] rename XFC to XC #22488

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question: SQL LEFT JOIN clause varies based on declarative- vs. method-style join #33745
  • Testing: How is AssertQuery supposed to work #33742
  • Programmatically opt-out of SqlClient's retrying behavior for OpenAsync in EF's database existence check #33741
    Backlog
  • OwnedNavigationBuilder.HasIndex lacks overload with name argument #33739
    9.0.0

Closed

  • System.InvalidProgramException: Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program. #33716
  • Post Process / Translate SelectExpression's lack of table #33730

PullRequests

Created

  • Add precompiled query generation to the dbcontext optimize command #33747
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33746
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Update branding to 8.0.7 #33737
  • Update branding to 6.0.32 #33736
  • [release/8.0] Update CODEOWNERS #33744
    tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Update CODEOWNERS #33743
    tell-mode

Updated

  • OTEL implementation, so far matching EventCounters infrastructure. #33633
  • Translate ToString() over enums #33706
  • TrimStart and TrimEnd with optional char array implementation for SQL Server #33715
